label: Blurry Scan
description: The image is out of focus or hard to read.

label: Incorrect Page Order
description: The page is not in the correct sequence.

label: Page Upside Down
description: The page was scanned upside down or rotated incorrectly.

label: Duplicate Page
description: This page appears to be a duplicate of another page.

label: Document Cut Off
description: The edges of the document appear to be cut off.

label: Unreadable Fine Print
description: The fine print or footnotes are not legible.

label: Incorrect Amount
description: A financial figure on the document appears to be incorrect.

label: Missing Signature
description: A required signature is not present on the document.

label: Incomplete Form
description: One or more required fields on the form are blank.

label: Wrong Document
description: This document does not belong in this batch.

label: Poor Quality
description: General low quality, stains, or other legibility issues.

label: Diagram Unclear
description: A technical diagram or schematic is not legible.

label: Handwriting Illegible
description: Handwritten notes or annotations cannot be read.

label: Incorrect Version
description: This appears to be an outdated version of the document.
